collection.name: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic

name: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic III
storyline: The player would be following Revan's path into the Unknown Regions, as he travels deep into the Unknown Regions and finds the outskirts of the real Sith Empire.
summary:
Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic 3 is a canceled video game in the Knights of the Old Republic series and is a follow up to Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords. 
 
The game would feature hubs, with additional circuit of hubs where you could choose which ones you optionally wanted to do to complete in that hub, or you could do them all.
